full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL MA'I MAndAL BZHI PA'I SGO NAS DGE MTSAN PHYVA GA-YANG SPEL BA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL DUS NGAN 'TSO BA'I LAG CHA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(ZHES DGE MTSAN PHYVA GA-YANG SPEL BA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL DUS NGAN 'TSO BA'I LAG CHA ZHES BYA BA 'DI @018B YANG, ^RGYAL KHAMS SMYUL BA'I SBRANG CHUNG DGE SBYONG BA RATNA KIRTIS RANG GI KUN RTOG LA SHAR BA LTAR TI MOR SPEL BA'I YI GE PA NI, RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS BGYIS PAS DGE MTSAN 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,) RNAM DPYOD DAD LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN CES BYA BAS, ,RNAM MANG MKHAS PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KHU RE CHER, ,RNAM KUN DON LDAN NGO MTSAR CHOG 'DI, ,RNAM PAR DAG PA'I BSAM PAS SPAR DU SKRUN, ,RNAM DKAR JI SNYID BSAGS PA DES, ,RNAM MANG MAR GYUR 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,RNAM PA KUN TU BDE @019A *, ,LDAN ZHING, ,RNAM KUN MKHYEN PA'I SA THOB SHOG ,GNAS SKABS SU YANG NYE 'BREL BCAS, ,GNAS MAL ZAS GOS NOR RDZAS SOGS, ,GNAS RKYEN PHUN SUM TSOGS PA YIS, ,GNAS TE YUN RING BDER GYUR CIG ,(CES BSTAN 'DZIN GYI 'DOD MOS LTAR DKA' MING CAN ZHIG GIS BGYIS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
